>
[Armiger's Mobility](/Feats.aspx?ID=911) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Hellknight Armiger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=20)

**Prerequisites**
expert in heavy armor; [Hellknight Armiger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=907)

</column>

---

You’ve learned how best to move in heavy armor. When wearing heavy armor, if you meet the Strength requirement, instead of reducing the movement penalty by 5 feet, you reduce the penalty by 10 feet (typically reducing the penalty to 0). If you are a dwarf with the [Unburdened Iron](/Feats.aspx?ID=5) feat, increase your Speed by 5 feet.
name: Armiger's Mobility
prerequisite: expert in heavy armor; Hellknight Armiger Dedication
